remarks: Version of modular law ~ pmod1i that holds in a Hilbert lattice, when an element meets an atom.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Sep-2012.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2013.)
statement:
atmod.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
atmod.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
atmod.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
atmod.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
atmod.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
atmod1i1m $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A ) /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) /\ ( X ./\ P ) .<_ Z ) -> ( ( X ./\ P ) .\/ ( Y ./\ Z ) ) = ( ( ( X ./\ P ) .\/ Y ) ./\ Z ) ) $.
